name: DrK
0:
”Alexa, ask doctor k. for a Fact.”
”Alexa, ask doctor k. for a social and cultural geography fact.”
”Alexa, ask doctor k. for a fun fact.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: doctor k.
des:
This fun fact skill was designed as a student project to serve as a useful tool for studying. Its primary subject matter is centered around Sociology and specifically, cultural and social geography. Its information is attributed to Soc. 3300, a course at California State University, Bakersfield & Dr. Isabella Kasselstrand, Professor of Sociology. 
The course explores spatial arrangements that affect and are affected by human activity on land. Focus is on the ways in which places and things are laid out and organized in the major geographical regions of the world, including the Americas, Europe, greater Asia, and Africa. Topics discussed include environment, demographic processes, health and malnutrition, language, religion, economic organization, and political structures. Special emphasis is placed on Third World countries as well as on comparative, international perspectives.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
